0.0.000.logs: -App is now usable, with basic functionality -Themes window -Settings window -Editor window

0.0.001.logs: -more themes added -better tool tip -theme item have their theme engraved to the it -cmd+E to open the editor window -font renderer now renders the font weight of 900 -new inputs, like n for next track, v for previous track and others -now possible to add params to the inputs -cover ins't fetched every time it reloads, now only the tracks are fetched every time, but now the algorithem uses map insted of 2 for loops -Added verions logs

0.0.100.logs: -Added dates to change logs -Possible to change fonts in any theme. The fonts are from the user's computer or Rubik, that comes installed -Overlay blur animates on creation instead of being immediately visible (easear on the eyes, at least for me) -Visible change logs to user -Possible to change the library paths, where the tracks are fetched from

0.0.101.logs: -Made the volume from settings not just change the slider in the main window, but also the volume of the audio source -When creating a new theme, the sidebar scrolls to the new theme
